titleStmt.title: The apology of Sr. Francis Bacon, Kt. in certain imputations concerning the late Earl of Essex written to the Right Honourable his very good Lord the Earl of Devonshire, Lord Lieutenant of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Bacon, Francis, 1561-1626.
Devonshire, Charles Blount, Earl of, 1563-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.G. & B.G. for William Lee,

notesStmt.note: Running title: The Lord Bacon's apology touching the late Earl of Essex.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
